TestGroupDocumentation.Title: pattern2 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a pattern-2.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a byte restricted SimpleType with pattern value "\-\d{2}".

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -34 for the byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -99, -10, -20 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -34 for the byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -128, -100, -9, 0, 9, 10, 99, 100, 127 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -99, -10, -20 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -128, -100, -9, 0, 9, 10, 99, 100, 127 and expects validation to fail.
